participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Determined and passionate about her dreams, she often speaks with conviction and authority.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Creative and introverted, he enjoys the solitude of his projects but seeks validation through his online presence.
participant_2.background: i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse.

content.text: i am the one who takes you there
